Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Ne olapara mbu Nyasaye akandalanga khuka abamabii bakholanga tawe. Toto ye abasitinjia imbeli okhula inyanga yetsimoni tsilikhookha
Balitsia tsimbilo, imirwe nichili hekulu, ne tsimoni tsiabu nitsilamotia motia tawe, ne emioyo chiabu nichili emikhaya

Ne wikanyilisie Abandu inyanga yeshinyasio shiliboolela, Abamabii baliboola mbu; “Nyasaye wefu, khusitiliekhwo ibise hatiti, khwitsa okhufuchilila omulango kukwo, nekhulalonda Abarumwa’’ “Koo shimwalikhwo ni mwetsuba khale mbu enywe shimulisikukhakhwo tawe?”
“Mana ni mumenya habundu wabaliasa bakholela obubii emioyo chiabu, mana nibibaloloshela shingala khwabakhola, ne nikhubopela emachelasio koosi (nanyu nimwalabukulila oluchendo tawe)
Netoto bakhola ebifwanga biabu, ne ebifwanga biabu bili ewa Nyasaye abimanyile , ne kata nikali mbu ebifwanga biabu nibisitia tsingulu
Kho shimulapara mbu Nyasaye afunakanga indakano yiyie khubarumwa bebe tawe. Toto Nyasaye niye wokhushila naye niye woyimongo
Inyanga weliloba lilikalukhanibwa okhuba liloba elindi, nende likulu, nabo baliemibwa imbeli wa Nyasaye Mulala Owa amani
Ne olilola Abamabii inyanga eyo nibaboyelwe khuminyororo
Thingubo tsiabu tsiliba tsieyilamu, ne omulilo kuliitsila obweni bwabu
Kho Nyasaye arunje buli Omundu khu kalia akayakhola. Toto Nyasaye ni Omwangu wokhubala
Kano kayela khubandu, bekanyilisibwe khuko, Ne banyoole okhumanya mbu Ye ni Nyasaye mulala butswa, kho balia abobwongo betsulile
